item.title: railties: Use Kamal for deployment by default, which includes generating a Rails-specific config/deploy.yml.
item.description:
* Use Kamal for deployment by default, which includes generating a Rails-specific config/deploy.yml. This can be skipped using --skip-kamal. See more: https://kamal-deploy.org/
*DHH*
item.author: David Heinemeier Hansson
